plot: Transylvania County in the Western North Carolina mountains is "The Land of Waterfalls" with hundreds just in this one county. This documentary provides a colorful overview of these glorious waterfalls.
title: Waterfalls of the Southern Highlands #4
plot_es: Transylvania County in the Western North Carolina mountains is "The Land of Waterfalls" with hundreds just in this one county. This documentary provides a colorful overview of these glorious waterfalls.
